name: Hounds: The Last Hope
summary:
Hounds: The Last Hope is a story based, MMO Role Playing Shooter presented in third-person perspective. The World is in ruins. Wickbroke forces caught the whole world off guard and started the apocalypse for humankind. Cities fell one by one. Only a handful of places stand still. The human resistance forces formed under two military organizations: AAC and CFA. As a part of an elite soldier team in AAC, you fight alongside your brothers and sisters against the overwhelming Wickbroke invaders. 
The future of mankind is up to you Soldier. Join Hounds!
